subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: A stream-lined fleet of six yachts is ready to set off on Saturday from Alicante, Spain, on the 9-leg Volvo Ocean Race.
snippet: A stream-lined fleet of six yachts is ready to set off on Saturday from Alicante, Spain, on the 9-leg Volvo Ocean Race.
